Amazing sequel to the already good portal 1 game. this game starts some time after portal 1 story, and you don't have to play the first game to understand this one. This game is packed with funny dialogue and interesting turnarounds.
The puzzles are much better than the first game with a lot more variables and variety. 

graphics- This game was released almost ten years ago, but the graphics aged really well and its still looking really good( for its age of course).

story- As i said this game is very funny and it holds a lot of twists and interesting turnarounds, so don't worry you wont fall a sleep from a boring story. 

gameplay - Puzzles are hard and creative, they will make you think, but i never faced a puzzle that was impossible to complete. 

main cons:
- a bit short (only 9 hours for the whole main campaign).

main pros:
+ graphics aged well. 
+ cool puzzles. 
+ funny and enjoyable story.

Fun game, played co-op several times over with new friends and it's always been a new and fun experience.

Single player is also epic beans.
I personally love this game. It is good for anyone that likes puzzle games or for someone that likes story games. Story from portal and half life is really satisfying.

The game largely improves on every aspect of the first Portal, and provides a lot of new features and variety of puzzles that consistently get you to think! The story gives a lot of comic relief but also a lot of tense moments, and it really touches up on the lore of Aperture Science started and how it had a downfall, as well as showing a lot more character with GladOs and the new character Wheatley, as well as giving more personality to even the main character, who literally can't talk! All around masterpiece.
мне очень понравилась игра задумкой, физикой и нескончаемой логичностью, я прошел полностью одиночную игру и меня это впечатлило
one of the best games of my childhood, a classic from an age that feels long gone.
永远的神作，天才的构思，10年过去了依然无人出其右。游戏过程的每一分钟都在感叹场景的壮观，丰富的细节，精妙的关卡设计，叙事的深度和流畅感，以及潜移默化中营造的末日氛围。从我被扔到井里掉到最底层一点一点往上爬那里开始，每一个场景都是震撼而有张力的。光圈科技yyds！

Pretty chill, also pretty freaking great to play with friends on coop, the levels make you really think.

I have played this game for quite some time now and I can definitely say that this game is a MUST HAVE!! This game is an all time Valve classic featuring the best qualities a game can have, from an amazing story line to creative solutions to problems to beautiful graphics. If you love games that have up to date graphics, amazing dialog, and a surprise at every turn then this is the game for you.
